# Financial Datasets API

## Overview

Financial Datasets is a comprehensive stock market API providing financial data for 30,000+ tickers spanning over 30 years. The API includes financial statements, equity prices, insider transactions, SEC filings, and more.

## Documentation Structure

### Core APIs

- [Company Data](https://docs.financialdatasets.ai/api-reference/endpoint/company/facts/cik): Access company facts and information by CIK or ticker
- [Crypto](https://docs.financialdatasets.ai/api-reference/endpoint/crypto/historical): Historical and snapshot data for cryptocurrencies
- [Earnings](https://docs.financialdatasets.ai/api-reference/endpoint/earnings/press-releases): Company earnings press releases
- [Financial Metrics](https://docs.financialdatasets.ai/api-reference/endpoint/financial-metrics/historical): Historical and snapshot views of key financial metrics
- [Financial Statements](https://docs.financialdatasets.ai/api-reference/endpoint/financials/income-statements): Complete financial statements including income statements, balance sheets, and cash flow statements
- [Insider Trades](https://docs.financialdatasets.ai/api-reference/endpoint/insider-trades/insider-trades): Track insider trading activity
- [Institutional Ownership](https://docs.financialdatasets.ai/api-reference/endpoint/institutional-ownership/investor): Monitor institutional investors and their holdings
- [News](https://docs.financialdatasets.ai/api-reference/endpoint/news/company): Company-specific news coverage
- [Prices](https://docs.financialdatasets.ai/api-reference/endpoint/prices/historical): Historical and real-time price data
- [Search](https://docs.financialdatasets.ai/api-reference/endpoint/financials/search-by-filters): Advanced search capabilities for financial data
- [SEC Filings](https://docs.financialdatasets.ai/api-reference/endpoint/filings/ticker): Access to SEC filing documents and data
- [Segmented Financials](https://docs.financialdatasets.ai/api-reference/endpoint/financials/segmented-revenues): Detailed segmented financial information

### Getting Started

- [Introduction](https://docs.financialdatasets.ai/introduction): Overview and key concepts
- [Quick Start](https://docs.financialdatasets.ai/quickstart): Get up and running quickly
- [Development Guide](https://docs.financialdatasets.ai/development): Detailed development instructions

## Support

For questions and support, join our [Discord community](https://discord.gg/hTtb8wzgSQ).

## Base URL

The base URL for all API endpoints is: https://financialdatasets.ai/api

## Authentication

API requests require authentication using an API key. Include your API key in the request headers.

## Rate Limits

Please refer to your subscription plan for specific rate limit information.

## Data Coverage

- 30,000+ tickers
- 30+ years of historical data
- Real-time and delayed data options
- Comprehensive financial statements
- SEC filings and documents
- Insider trading data
- Institutional ownership information
- Market prices and metrics
